betterquesting:10.desc:8:
There's many situations you wish you could filter labels before attaching them to something. Well, you §ocan§r, but crafting them with a phial of Essentia means keeping a stockpile of dozens upon dozens of phials on hand, searching for the one you need, accidentally emptying it instead of putting it back and being confused why it's nowhere to be found later and having to get a new one... the process could be more convenient, is what you're saying.

The Aspect Library is exactly what you were looking for. A quick reference collection detailing the aspects you've discovered, enough to let you pre-filter labels without making a mess of anything.

You know, your mentor was right. Sometimes it's the little things that saves you the most work.
